blocks

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • blocks.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checkpoint, Letter, Obstacle, Terrain, Text

    public abstract class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    The block class for all blocks that make up a level.

    Time spent:

    Siavash Samiei: 0.5 hours

    Justin Pu: 0.5 hours
    Instance Variables

    texture the texture id of the block.

    x the x coordinate of the block.

    y the y coordinate of the block.

    random a variable for randomized textures.

    Version:
    2 06.08.15
    Author:
    Siavash Samiei May 20, 2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block(int x, int y, int texture)
      Constructor of the block class that initializes the x, y, and texture values of a block.
